overview: Gangster milieu meets Guantanamo Bay. This is what the planned thriller boils down to, because a young woman (Noomi Rapace) flees from a nasty criminal and gets involved with a young man who was housed in the Guantanamo Bay camp. Both are in an existential crisis that makes them doubt their lives so far. Together they may be able to reorient themselves by giving each other support. But perhaps other forces will also take over the reins.
title: Alive Alone
